SEARCH
Package org.Controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
org.Controller.GameEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameEngine extends Object implements Serializable
Entry point of the game. Keep track of the state game is in. Allows for defining Logging Context, as the file where the log of the game should be saved.
See Also:

    • setIssueOrderPhase

      public void setIssueOrderPhase(boolean p_isTournament) throws InvalidState
      Changes the Execution of the game to IssueOrderPhase
      Throws:
      InvalidState - in case if there is abrupt command provided by user

    • setOrderExecutionPhase

      public void setOrderExecutionPhase() throws InvalidState
      Sets the game to Order Execution Phase according to the State Pattern
      Throws:
      InvalidState - in case if an abrupt command is provided by user.

    • log

      public static void log(String p_fileName, LogLevel p_level, String p_logging)
      Static function to make the logging available for the Classes of the game
      Parameters:
      p_fileName - : Basically denotes the file and function from which the log is coming
      p_level - : Basically denotes the level of the Log, could be HEADING, SUBHEADING and BASICLOG
      p_logging - : Log message to be written in the file.
